metadata.title: CVE-2022-30045 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The functionezxml_decode() performs incorrect memory handling while parsing crafted XMLfiles, leading to a heap out-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: netcdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
scilab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
